data.title: What is the efficient way to find a producer for Kannada movie?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 3): If he really think he has good script and have a confidence & patience, then there are two options.

1. Crowd funding- As Pawan Kumar did for his film Lucia. Time and again experience is must to go through this route. People look at your credentials when you all there money for m...
